titleStmt.title: The distressed damsels: or, A dolefull ditty of a sorrowfull assembly of young maidens that were met together near Thames-street, to bewail the loss of their loves which were lately press'd away to sea. To the tune of An orange. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Back,

notesStmt.note: Imprint place and date suggested by Wing.
Verse: "My sweet sister Sue, ah! what l shado I ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
